statements: SELECT * FROM concert_schedule ORDER BY concert_date DESC;
SELECT artist_name, venue_name, concert_date FROM concert_schedule WHERE artist_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT artist_name, venue_name FROM concert_schedule WHERE concert_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM concert_schedule WHERE venue_name LIKE '%Hall%' ORDER BY concert_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(concert_date) AS latest_concert_date FROM concert_schedule;
SELECT * FROM concert_schedule ORDER BY concert_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT artist_name, venue_name, concert_date FROM concert_schedule WHERE artist_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT artist_name, venue_name FROM concert_schedule WHERE concert_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT artist_name, venue_name, concert_date FROM concert_schedule WHERE venue_name LIKE 'Music%';
SELECT concert_id, artist_name, venue_name, concert_date FROM concert_schedule WHERE concert_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT * FROM musicians;
SELECT musician_name, musician_genre FROM musicians ORDER BY musician_genre ASC;
SELECT musician_id, musician_name FROM musicians WHERE musician_genre = 'Rock';
SELECT * FROM concert_schedules WHERE concert_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT concert_name, concert_date FROM concert_schedules ORDER BY concert_date DESC;
SELECT musician_name, musician_genre FROM musicians WHERE musician_genre='Rock' ORDER BY musician_name DESC;
SELECT concert_name, concert_date FROM concert_schedules WHERE concert_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY concert_date ASC;

SELECT musician_id, musician_name, concert_name FROM musicians JOIN concert_schedules ON musicians.musician_id = concert_schedules.musician_id WHERE concert_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT musician_name, COUNT(concert_id) AS total_concerts FROM musicians LEFT JOIN concert_schedules ON musicians.musician_id = concert_schedules.musician_id GROUP BY musician_name HAVING total_concerts > 3;
SELECT musician_name, concert_name, concert_date FROM musicians JOIN concert_schedules ON musicians.musician_id = concert_schedules.musician_id WHERE musician_genre='Pop' ORDER BY concert_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM musicians;
SELECT musician_name, nationality FROM musicians ORDER BY nationality;
SELECT musician_id, musician_name FROM musicians WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM concerts WHERE concert_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT musician_name, start_date, end_date FROM musicians JOIN tours ON musicians.musician_id = tours.musician_id;
SELECT * FROM musicians;
SELECT musician_name, birthdate, nationality FROM musicians ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT musician_name, tour_name, start_date, end_date FROM musicians JOIN tours ON musicians.musician_id = tours.musician_id;
SELECT musician_name, concert_date, venue, ticket_price FROM musicians JOIN concerts ON musicians.musician_id = concerts.musician_id WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT musician_name, tour_name, start_date, end_date FROM musicians JOIN tours ON musicians.musician_id = tours.musician_id ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, artist_genre FROM artists ORDER BY artist_name DESC;
SELECT artist_name, artist_label FROM artists WHERE artist_genre = 'Rock';
SELECT * FROM albums WHERE album_release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT concert_location, concert_date FROM concerts ORDER BY concert_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, artist_genre FROM artists WHERE artist_label = 'Sony Music';
SELECT album_title, album_release_date FROM albums WHERE album_genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY album_release_date DESC;
SELECT song_title, song_duration, song_lyrics FROM songs WHERE song_artist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT concert_location, concert_date, concert_ticket_price FROM concerts WHERE concert_ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY concert_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre='Pop';
SELECT album_title, release_date FROM albums ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT tour_name, start_date, end_date FROM tours WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT venue_name, location, capacity FROM venues WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE artist_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY artist_id DESC;
SELECT album_title, release_date FROM albums WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01' AND artist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT artist_name, genre, agency FROM artists JOIN albums ON artists.artist_id = albums.artist_id WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY artist_name ASC, album_title DESC;
SELECT venue_name, location, capacity FROM venues WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY location ASC, capacity DESC;
SELECT tour_name, start_date, end_date FROM tours WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-10-31' ORDER BY end_date ASC, start_date DESC;
